review: If you're ready to cut the cable this is a must have.  Easy to set up and works perfectly.  Love it.
author: Scott F Phillips

review: Ended up returning mine because of the limitations on what could be displayed on the TV. Alternate brands seem to give better "bang for the buck".
author: Gary Bruce

review: When it works it is a barely capable Netflix and YouTube dongle, unfortunately those instances are rare.  Anecdotally, with my HTC One M8, both with lollipop and before, the chromecast struggles to simply do what it's supposed to do.  3 stars just because it's cheap and there are times when it can pull through.
author: C. Leonard "Tsimtsum Overdrive"

review: I bought this several months ago to stream Netflix.  I've only been able to use it a few times and, in the last few weeks not at all.  Its a waste of time and money.
author: S. Freeman
